alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southwestern Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 100 PM CDT... At 1233 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jefferson, or near Metairie. This storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Marrero, Harvey, Avondale, Timberlane, Chalmette, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Woodmere, Elmwood, Terrytown, Bridge City, River Ridge, Estelle, Arabi and Waggaman. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 225 and 246. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
